item.title: John Mayer - Waiting On The World To Change - Key of C - Andy Ramos
item.description: Play along video for the song Waiting On The World To Change by John Mayer from the channel Andy Ramos. Chords used in the song: Am, C, Dm, F, G.

item.title: John Mayer - Changing - Key of C - ukeplayalongs
item.description: Play along video for the song Changing by John Mayer from the channel ukeplayalongs. Chords used in the song: Am, C, F, G.
